summary: SummaryRevive and refresh tired eyes with Mario Badescu Hydrogel Under Eye Patches, infused with Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, Caffeine, and Red Algae
details: DetailsBenefitsTiger Grass: Renowned for its anti-inflammatory and healing properties, which make it effective in treating under eye puffiness. It helps to soothe and revitalize the skin.Niacinamide: This active form of vitamin B3 reduces enlarged pores and fine lines while enhancing skin tone and glow. It also boosts skin elasticity and strengthens the skin barrier.Caffeine: Helps drain puffiness and reduce signs of fatigue by stimulating microcirculation in the under-eye area.Item 2636113How To UseUse the provided spatula to gently lift and separate patches. Apply patches under your eyes and leave on for 15-20 minutes. Remove and pat any remaining serum into the skin.IngredientsWater (aqua/eau), Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Chondrus Crispus (irish Sea Moss) Powder, Benzyl Glycol, Ceratonia Siliqua (carob) Gum, Xanthan Gum, Chondrus Crispus (irish Sea Moss) extract, Allantoin, ethylhexylglycerin, Niacinamide, Caffeine, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Potassium Chloride, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Mica, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dextrin, Butylene Glycol, titanium Dioxide(CI 77891), Raspberry Ketone, Adenosine, 1,2-hexanediol, Disodium EDTA, Methyl Diisopropyl Propionamide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Centella Asiatica extract, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol, Blue 1 (CI 42090), Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hyaluronic acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Potassium Hyaluronate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use the provided spatula to gently lift and separate patches. Apply patches under your eyes and leave on for 15-20 minutes. Remove and pat any remaining serum into the skin.

reviews.headline: Love these!
reviews.comments: Best eye patches I have ever tried!My skin feels so amazing after using them and they feel so great while there on. I'm getting ready to order the facial mask by Mario here at Ulta!

reviews.headline: Works great!
reviews.comments: I use these in the morning when heading out and they work great.  They're a little heavy at first but I think because they're better quality than ones I've used before and after a couple minutes they feel more secure and so good!

reviews.headline: Ok…
reviews.comments: While the gel works, the patches are heavy and will slide down your face. I had to lie down while using them.

reviews.headline: Love this!!!
reviews.comments: I love using this in the morning when im feeling extra tired!
